document.full_text: japan's ruling party fared badly in weekend local elections after prime minister naoto kan came under fire for his handling of the nuclear crisis, bolstering rivals who want him to quit once the crisis ends.
document.title: japan pm weakened by local elections and nuclear woes
lines_and_colors: japan's ruling party fared badly in weekend local elections after prime minister naoto kan came under fire for his handling of the nuclear crisis, bolstering rivals who want him to quit once the crisis ends.
